mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.created_at, u.nickname, f.access_url, pu.nickname AS replied_nickname FROM comments c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON u.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN comments pc ON c.parent_id = pc.comment_id LEFT JOIN user pu ON pc.user_id = pu.user_id WHERE c.article_id = #{articleId} AND c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.comment_id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.created_at, u.nickname, f.access_url, pu.nickname AS replied_nickname FROM comments c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON u.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN comments pc ON c.parent_id = pc.comment_id LEFT JOIN user pu ON pc.user_id = pu.user_id WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.comment_id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.content, c.parent_id, c.created_at, u.nickname, f.access_url, pu.nickname AS replied_nickname FROM comments c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON u.file_id = f.file_id LEFT JOIN comments pc ON c.parent_id = pc.comment_id LEFT JOIN user pu ON pc.user_id = pu.user_id WHERE c.comment_id = #{commentId}
